A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall the movie has some issues. I don't like how the OT Characters were treated. I didn't have a problem with the overall vision\, but I think it was executed poorly. I think there was some great moments\, and some really cringe worthy moments. I've seen it twice\, and I'll buy the DVD\, but now my hope for Star Wars is with Solo and the next installment of this trilogy.
